Welcome to GNU MediaGoblin’s documentation!¶

This documentation covers the GNU MediaGoblin software. It is versioned alongside the code and the source for this documentation is located in the mediagoblin repository in the docs/ directory.

It is also viewable on the Web site in HTML form.
